text: The Sorcerers of Araby who dwell near the coasts are adept at manipulating the Wind of Ghyran and taming Sea Nymphs.
The desert Sorcerers of Araby follow their own ancient tradition, calling upon the Desert Spirits and their elemental might.
Some Arabyan Sorcerers have learned to bind Fire Efreets to their will, mastering the Wind of Aqshy in the process.
Tempest Djinns and the Wind of Azyr are powerful allies to these Arabyan Sorcerers.
The cities of Araby conceal countless dangers in their shadows. Its assassins are famed for striking swiftly and unseen.
Lesser nobles, yet warriors without equal. They often serve as bodyguards to the greatest lords of Araby.
The Grand Viziers are personal advisors to the Sultans and often have the task of commanding the armies on the battlefield so that their masters do not have to leave their luxurious palace.

The grim Sheikhs are high-ranking nobles, famed both as warriors and commanders.
